about_the_game: "Eyes of the Storm" is a third-person arcade-style racing game that invites players to race, jump and perform stunts on hoverbikes in an open world. By manipulating the hoverbike in the air, the player can perform tricks and earn points and coins. They can then upgrade their bike in the store, giving them even more control over their stunts. In addition, there are different maps that the player can explore and race on. For example, the player can race against the clock and beat their high scores, participate in a stunt challenge, or compete against AI to cross the finish line first.
